sentence.Network_en: We must supersede old machines by new ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须以新机器取代旧机器。

sentence.Network_en: The use of robots will someday supersede manual labor.
sentence.Network_cn: 机器人的使用有一天会取代人力.

sentence.Network_en: We must supersede old machines by [ with ] new ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须以新机器取代旧机器.

list.abs: supersaturation 过饱和superseded map 过时地图supersonic echo sounder 超声波回声测深仪
本图由X取代 superseded by X本图取代X supersedes X上部结构(建筑) superstructure
this highlighted it to be opposite of fixed phone supersede function .这凸显了它对固定电话的替代作用。
the use of machinery has superseded manual labour ., 机器的使用已经取代了手工劳动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'postpone, defer'): from Old French superseder, from Latin supersedere 'be superior to', from super- 'above' + sedere 'sit'. The current sense dates from the mid 17th cent

entry.tran: 取代，替代(陈旧或令人不满意的事物)
entry.def: If something is superseded by something newer, it is replaced because it has become old-fashioned or unacceptable.

example.ex: Hand tools are relics of the past that have now been superseded by the machine.
example.tran: 手工工具是历史的遗物，现在已经被机器所取代。

means.word_mean: 1. take the place or move into the position of;

sentences.sentence: "Smith replaced Miller as CEO after Miller left"
"the computer has supplanted the slide rule"
"Mary replaced Susan as the team's captain and the highest-ranked player in the school"

auth_sentence.content: Your poorly read, still opinions supersede facts nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your poorly read, still opinions supersede facts nowadays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your poorly read, still opinions supersede facts nowadays.

auth_sentence.content: They also said the fraud claim would supersede any labor agreements.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also said the fraud claim would supersede any labor agreements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also said the fraud claim would supersede any labor agreements.

auth_sentence.content: We were warned, but the urge for fame and especially fortune, appears to supersede all such considerations.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were warned, but the urge for fame and especially fortune, appears to supersede all such considerations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were warned, but the urge for fame and especially fortune, appears to supersede all such considerations.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"在……上面"; 2. 表示"超级,超过,过度"

stems_affixes.word_buile: super在……上面+fic做+ial……的→在表面上做
super超级,超过,过度+annuated有年纪的→adj.老迈的,老式的
super超级,超过,过度+cili眉毛+ous……的→在眉毛上看人→目中无人
super超级,超过,过度+flu流+ous……的→超过了流出来
super超级,超过,过度+natural自然的→adj.超自然的
super超级,超过,过度+sensitive敏感的→adj.过度敏感的
super超级,超过,过度+sized大小的→adj.超大型的
super超级,超过,过度+sonic音速的→adj.超音速的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
stems_affixes.word_buile: supre=super超级,超过,过度+eme→adj.极度的, 极大的, 至高的, 最高的
super在……上面+stit建立+ion表名词→建立在人[理智]之上的东西→迷信
super在……上面+structure结构→n.上层建筑
super超级,超过,过度+market市场→n.超级市场
super在……上面+impose放上去→在上面放→强加
super在……上面+intend想要,打算→在上面算计→监督
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]
super在……上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视
super超级,超过,过度+charge收费,负担→负担过重

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
consider考虑+ate……的→考虑到的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside[v.[at,over]主持]+ent人→主持[的人]
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
sub下+side坐→坐下去→平息
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

means.word_mean: 取代, 接替(已非最佳选择或已过时的事物）

sentences.en: No sooner do you buy a computer than they bring out a new one which supersedes it.
sentences.cn: 你买电脑后不久他们就会推出新产品取代它。
